title: 11/11/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
itunes:title: 11/11/21 DPS Hour 1 Chris Simms
description:
In hour 1 of the Dan Patrick Show, the guys have a light hearted moment debating a hypothetical 1 on 1 versus Scottie Pippen & Michael Jordan. Chris Simms joins to talk CeeDee Lamb, Odell Beckham and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
